description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability associated with CVE-2024-26189:

1. Apply the relevant updates as listed in the KB articles: KB-5036925, KB-5036894, KB-5036893, and KB-5036892.
2. Ensure your system is running one of the supported build numbers: 10.0.19045.4291, 10.0.19044.4291, 10.0.22631.3447, 10.0.22000.2899, 10.0.22621.3447, or 10.0.10240.20596.
3. Restart your system following the installation of each update to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- These updates address various issues related to improper input validation, thus mitigating the vulnerability.
- Ensure you have proper backups before proceeding with any updates to avoid data loss.

For further information, check the update guide at: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-26189.
